.. _`primerclip`:

PRIMERCLIP
==========

Primer trimming on sam file, https://github.com/swiftbiosciences/primerclip






Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule primerclip:
        input:
            0.66.0-225-gb77af9ed_file="0.66.0-225-gb77af9ed_file",
            alignment_file="mapped/{sample}.bam"
        output:
            alignment_file="mapped/{sample}.trimmed.bam"
        log:
            "logs/primerclip/{sample}.log"
        params:
            extra=""
        wrapper:
            "0.66.0-225-gb77af9ed/bio/primerclip"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.
